meanings.sent1: The whizzbang of the fireworks startled the children.
meanings.sent2: The whizzbang of the thunder made the dog hide under the bed.
meanings.sent3: The whizzbang of the balloon popping made everyone jump.
meanings.sent4: The whizzbang of the car crash echoed through the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The whizzbang of the firecracker lit up the night sky.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is very impressive or successful.
meanings.sent1: The magician's final trick was a real whizzbang!
meanings.sent2: The new smartphone is a real whizzbang with its advanced features.
meanings.sent3: The chef's signature dish was a real whizzbang with the customers.
meanings.sent4: The athlete's performance was a whizzbang that amazed the audience.
meanings.sent5: The company's latest product release was a real whizzbang in the market.

meanings.sent1: She whizzbangs through the obstacle course with ease.
meanings.sent2: The squirrel can whizzbang up the tree in seconds.
meanings.sent3: The dancer whizzbangs across the stage gracefully.
meanings.sent4: The skilled pilot can whizzbang the plane through turbulent weather.
meanings.sent5: The athlete whizzbangs past the finish line, winning the race.
